column1: Uchi////Uchi is worth saving money for perhaps a special date or business dinner. If you're hoping to be impressed
column2: they will certainly do exactly that. Simply stated
column4: sashimi/nigiri beyond what you would expect. If you're budget minded
column5: you might want to try another sushi bar but if you are seeking a true fine dining experience
column6: Uchi is a never miss gem in the heart of Montrose/Westheimer. The menu selections are not cheap by comparison to most other similar places
column7: however it is the high-quality cuisine and fine attention to detail you would expect in relation to cost. Yet
column8: it is this exquisite experience of savory flavors (including familiar favorites and unique signature creations) that gracefully combine to make Uchi an easy winner.
